descriptiontext.p: The Copy / Move / Rename operation can be performed from the details page.

li.p: Type a new location in the folder field or use the Change destination folder function. Type a new name in the new name field, if needed. Click Copy to commit.
To get correct metadata for the new file you need to do Check out and Check in from the Editor. Start with Refresh in the CMS Browser, to see the new object.
Type a new location in the folder field or use the Change destination folder function. Type a new name in the new name field, if needed.
Check the delete the original box
A warning will be displayed if the object is referenced by other objects.

note.p: The reference(s) must be manually updated.

li.p: To get correct metadata for the new file you need to do Check out and Check in from the Editor. Start with Refresh in the CMS Browser, to see the new object.
Type a new name in the new name field.
Check the delete the original box
A warning will be displayed if the object is referenced by other objects.

note.p: The reference(s) must be manually updated.

li.p: To get correct metadata for the new file you need to do Check out and Check in from the Editor. Start with Refresh in the CMS Browser, to see the new object.

descriptiontext.p: The Delete operation can be performed from the details page and deletes the selected object from the current folder version forward, all historical versions will be kept.

li.p: Enter comments in the history comment field.
